mean_en: (of workers) giving help or support to the main group of workers; (of a piece of equipment) used if there is a problem with the main piece of equipment
sentence: We have an auxiliary generator to deal with sudden black-outs.
sentence_trans: 我们有一个备用的发电机防止突然停电。
word_etyma: auxili帮助 + ary……的 → auxiliary辅助的
